nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, Republic Navy Captain Pharl McQuarrie commanded a refitted Consular-class cruiser. McQuarrie and the cruiser served in the Republic defense of the planet Ukio in the early years of the war.
McQuarrie's Consular-class cruiser appears in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars webcomic The Clone Wars: Act on Instinct, published on StarWarsKids.com from 2009 to 2010.
